    This class is the controller for the User class.

    This class is the controller for the Faculty class.

    This class is the manager for the faculty projects.
    FacultyRequestManager

    This class is used to hash the password of the user.
    ICoordProjectManager
    This interface is used to manage the projects from a course coordinator's perspective.

    This interface is used to manage the requests made by coordinators.
    IFacultyProjectManager
    This interface is used to manage the projects of a faculty.
    IFacultyRequestManager
    This interface is the interface for the FacultyRequestManager class.

    This interface is the interface for the StudentProjectManager class.
    IStudentRequestManager
    This interface is used to define the methods that a StudentRequestManager.

    This class is the controller for the Login class.

    This class is the manager for the Project class.

    StudentController
    This class is the controller for the Student class.

    StudentRequestManager
